BusinessObjectClass - the business object class which is represented by the current wrapper
Enclosing class:
SmartAdapters
public abstract static class SmartAdapters.SimpleBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
extends SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>

A basic wrapper implementation, which lets specify its getType(int, Object) and representation layout identifier used to inflate it.
